Text:
This technique works fine for me. Hope it works for you. Please show your appreciation both by seeding this torrent and also uploading your ebooks to tpb when you have managed to remove the drm!

Take care
Neil

It works very well!
Hint: to access The Plugins menu, go to "Preferences" and pick "Change Calibre behavior"
Has anyone released a crack for the newest DRM (I think  it was released in November).?

Many thanks.  This technique works a treat on kindle and google books alike.
